briefdescription.para: Gets a CommandSender as Player.

simplesect.para: Player, nullptr if not a Player

briefdescription.para: Returns the name of this player.

simplesect.para: Player name or null if we have not seen a name for this player yet

briefdescription.para: Checks if this player is a server operator.

simplesect.para: true if this is an operator, otherwise false

briefdescription.para: Sets the operator status of this player.

parameterdescription.para: New operator value

briefdescription.para: Returns the Xbox User ID (XUID) of this player.
Gets the socket address of this player.
Transfers the player to another server.

parameterdescription.para: Server address to transfer the player to.
Server port to transfer the player to

briefdescription.para: Kicks player with custom kick message.

parameterdescription.para: kick message

briefdescription.para: Makes the player perform the given command.

parameterdescription.para: Command to perform

simplesect.para: true if the command was successful, otherwise false

briefdescription.para: Returns if the player is in sneak mode.

simplesect.para: true if player is in sneak mode

briefdescription.para: Sets the sneak mode of the player.

parameterdescription.para: true if player should appear sneaking

briefdescription.para: Gets whether the player is sprinting or not.
Sets whether the player is sprinting or not.

parameterdescription.para: true if the player should be sprinting

memberdef.argsstring: (Location location, std::string sound, float volume, float pitch)=0
memberdef.name: playSound

briefdescription.para: Play a sound for a player at the location.

parameterdescription.para: The location to play the sound
The internal sound name to play
The volume of the sound
The pitch of the sound

briefdescription.para: Stop the specified sound from playing.

parameterdescription.para: the sound to stop

briefdescription.para: Stop all sounds from playing.
Gives the player the amount of experience specified.

parameterdescription.para: Exp amount to give

briefdescription.para: Gives the player the amount of experience levels specified.

parameterdescription.para: amount of experience levels to give or take

briefdescription.para: Gets the players current experience progress towards the next level.

detaileddescription.para: This is a percentage value. 0.0 is "no progress" and 1.0 is "next level".

briefdescription.para: Sets the players current experience progress towards the next level.

detaileddescription.para: This is a percentage value. 0.0 is "no progress" and 1.0 is "next level".

parameterdescription.para: New experience progress

briefdescription.para: Gets the players current experience level.
Sets the players current experience level.

parameterdescription.para: New experience level

briefdescription.para: Gets the players total experience points.

detaileddescription.para: This refers to the total amount of experience the player has collected over time and is not currently displayed to the client.

briefdescription.para: Determines if the Player is allowed to fly via jump key double-tap.

simplesect.para: True if the player is allowed to fly.

briefdescription.para: Sets if the Player is allowed to fly via jump key double-tap.

parameterdescription.para: If flight should be allowed.

briefdescription.para: Checks to see if this player is currently flying or not.

simplesect.para: True if the player is flying, else false.

briefdescription.para: Makes this player start or stop flying.

parameterdescription.para: True to fly.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current allowed speed that a client can fly.

simplesect.para: The current allowed speed, default is 0.05.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the speed at which a client will fly.

parameterdescription.para: The new speed.

briefdescription.para: Gets the current allowed speed that a client can walk.

simplesect.para: The current allowed speed, default is 0.10.

detaileddescription.para: Sets the speed at which a client will walk.

parameterdescription.para: The new speed.

briefdescription.para: Gets the Scoreboard displayed to this player.

simplesect.para: The current scoreboard seen by this player

parameterdescription.para: New Scoreboard for the player

briefdescription.para: Sends this player a popup message.

parameterdescription.para: Message to be displayed

briefdescription.para: Sends this player a tip message.

parameterdescription.para: Message to be displayed

briefdescription.para: Sends this player a toast notification.

parameterdescription.para: The title of the toast notification.
The content of the toast notification.

briefdescription.para: Sends a title and a subtitle message to the player. If they are empty strings, the display will be updated as such. The titles will be displayed with the default timings.

parameterdescription.para: Title text
Subtitle text

memberdef.argsstring: (std::string title, std::string subtitle, int fade_in, int stay, int fade_out) const =0
memberdef.name: sendTitle

briefdescription.para: Sends a title and a subtitle message to the player. If they are empty strings, the display will be updated as such.

parameterdescription.para: Title text
Subtitle text
time in ticks for titles to fade in. Defaults to 10.
time in ticks for titles to stay. Defaults to 70.
time in ticks for titles to fade out. Defaults to 20.

briefdescription.para: Resets the title displayed to the player. This will clear the displayed title / subtitle and reset timings to their default values.

the location to spawn at

the position on the z axis to spawn at
